Title: Sleeping Giants
Writer: Ray McKinnon (creator), Scott Teems, Chad Feehan (executive story editor), Coleman Herbert (executive story editor), Scott Teems (story editor)
Actors: Aden Young, Abigail Spencer, J. Smith-Cameron, Adelaide Clemens
Plot: Amantha dreads the worst as she prepares for Daniel to awaken from his induced coma. Teddy's business plans are thwarted by his dad, and he gets some unwelcome news from Tawney. Jared ...
